description: This nutritionally approved salmon recipe with braised lettuce, peas, brown rice and mint is sure to make a regular appearance at your dinner table.
keywords: Fish dishes,Tree nut free,Egg free,Dinner Made Easy,Sesame free,Sep 2021,Dairy free,Salmon
name: Salmon With Braised Lettuce & Peas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil
500g Woolworths frozen salmon fillets, skin on, thawed
0.5 iceberg lettuce, cut into thin wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Heat half the oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook garlic and onion, stirring, for 5 minutes or until softened. Add 1 1/2 cups water and stock, then bring to the boil. Reduce heat to medium and simmer, uncovered, for 2 minutes or until liquid has reduced by one-third.
Meanwhile, heat remaining oil in a medium frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook salmon for 3 minutes on each side or until just cooked through.

Heat rice according to packet instructions. Add lettuce to stock mixture and cook, turning once, for 3 minutes or until wilted. Add peas and snow peas, then cook for 1 minute or until tender. Season with pepper and stir in zest.
Divide rice among bowls and serve topped with lettuce mixture, salmon, lemon wedges and mint.
